title: What Can We Expect From Ubisoft Foward? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.07.20
description:
Assassin's Creed? Watch Dogs? Far Cry? Blessing and Imran discuss their expectations and predictions for the upcoming Ubisoft Forward.

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Every day this week a new part of Andy’s Full Playthrough of The Last of Us Part 2 will post at 3PM PT on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed &Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:37 - What can we expect at Ubisoft Forward? - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:37:50 - Microsoft is interested in WB Games - Jeremy Winslow @ Gamespot
00:40:11 - Is there such a thing as too many first party studios - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:46:00 - Kingdoms of Amalur’s remaster has finally been revealed - Fraser Brown @ PC Gamer
00:49:20 - Sega Announces a Miniature Arcade Cabinet - Wesley Leblanc @ IGN
00:52:00 - Out today
00:54:35 -  Quip
00:55:52 -  Klarna
00:57:05 -  Hims
 Reader mail   -
00:58:40 - During yesterdays’s KFGD the phrase “as long as you are in their ecosystem” came up when discussing Microsoft’s strategy with regards to bringing their games to PC. This isn’t the first time the phrase has been used, as it typically comes up when discussing the company’s strategy of bringing their games to the most people. I wanted to ask, what does this mean though? - Ignacio Rojas
01:04:00 - Squad Up: Alec Bobko(Twitch) - Albob875
01:05:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary
